title: Boakse
author: Boakse
created_time: April 05, 2023, 11:24:37 PMLast edit: April 12, 2023, 12:12:19 PM by Boakse
content: I have 2x brand new 185MH Goldshell Doge+LTC Mini Miner (Voskcoin Edition) I would like to sell.Brand new in box, I ordered them myself (direct via Goldshell) 1,5-2 year back or so...Used 4 of them to heat my app. and still have 2 brand new in box.NO PSU, only the Miner, brand new in box.Asking Price: 250Â  200 euro each, or give me a nice offer for both.First checking out if people are willing to buy, if so I will post photos here on Bitcointalk and not via PM.

comments.author: Hamukione
comments.body: Think you could lower the price a fair bit, as a new one on Amazon costs 299$, which includes a PSU.

comments.author: Boakse
comments.body: Quote from: Hamukione on April 12, 2023, 11:52:16 AMThink you could lower the price a fair bit, as a new one on Amazon costs 299$, which includes a PSU.thanks for the advice, just lowered them in price

comments.author: Papillion
comments.body: did you have photo's of the mining equipment maybe with a little scrap of paper that has your forum name on itthanks,

comments.author: Boakse
comments.body: Sold on the local market!Too bad, 200 euro was a nice price...Paid 650 euro each and EU taxes where added on top of this price.However people seems not willing to buy, not even for 200 euro these days.Still have some used ones with psu I like to sell also, however I am not gonna waste my time here again,Also tried selling some X2 miners, a while back, was also a waste of time...I will sell them on the local market also.
